trans-unit.source: Provides access to data from an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從資料提供存取<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This is a temporary helper class used to access internal members of an <xref:System.ActivationContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 這是暫時的 helper 類別，用來存取內部成員的<xref:System.ActivationContext>物件。</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the application manifest from an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容的應用程式資訊清單從<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 包含資訊清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The application manifest that is contained by the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式資訊清單所包含的<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the manifest of the last deployment component in an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得最後一個部署元件中的資訊清單<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 包含資訊清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The manifest of the last deployment component in the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的最後一個部署元件的資訊清單<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a byte array containing the raw content of the application manifest..
trans-unit.target: 取得位元組陣列，包含應用程式資訊清單的原始內容...

trans-unit.source: The object to get bytes from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得位元組的物件。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the application manifest as raw data.
trans-unit.target: 包含做為原始資料的應用程式資訊清單的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the manifest of the first deployment component in an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得的資訊清單中的第一個部署元件的<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object containing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 包含資訊清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The manifest of the first deployment component in the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個部署元件的資訊清單<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a byte array containing the raw content of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得位元組陣列，包含部署資訊清單的原始內容。

trans-unit.source: The object to get bytes from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得位元組的物件。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the deployment manifest as raw data.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含部署資訊清單做為原始資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the first time this <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object has been run.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這是否為第一個時間<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>物件都已執行。

trans-unit.source: The object to examine.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> indicates it is running for the first time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>指出它是第一次執行; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Informs an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> to get ready to be run.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>取得準備好執行。

trans-unit.source: The object to inform.
trans-unit.target: 要通知的物件。
